DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double blind , placebo control , parallel group study approximately 120 subject moderate severe psoriasis PASI score least 10 . Following run-in subject randomize receive either oral 30 mg ZPL-3893787 daily placebo daily 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Determine Efficacy ZPL-3893787 Subjects With Plaque Psoriasis
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double blind , placebo control , parallel group study approximately 120 subject moderate severe psoriasis Psoriasis Area Severity Index ( PASI ) score least 10 Investigator 's Global Assessment ( IGA ) 3 ( 0-4 scale ) . Following run-in subject randomize receive either oral 30 mg ZPL-3893787 daily placebo daily 12 week . Subjects attend clinic Baseline ( Day 0 ) review confirm meet inclusion/exclusion criterion . If appropriate , randomize receive either oral 30 mg ZPL-3893787 daily placebo daily 12 week .
DOC.criteria: A documented history moderate severe plaque psoriasis least 6 month prior screen . Male female , age ≥18 year . Psoriasis Area Severity Index ( PASI ) ≥10 Screening Day 0 . An Investigator 's Global Assessment ( IGA ) score ≥ 3 Screening Day 0 . Psoriasis affect ≥10 % BSA Screening Day 0 . Current diagnosis Pustular , Guttate , Erythrodermic , exfoliative nail psoriasis diagnosis inverse psoriasis without plaque psoriasis . Concurrent skin disease ( e.g . acne ) severity study area could interfere study evaluation presence skin comorbidities may interfere study assessment . Active skin infection ( e.g . impetigo , abscess ) clinically apparent infection . Biologic treatment psoriasis ( e.g . Enbrel , Humira , Stelara , Cosentyx ) within 3 month start RunIn . Phototherapy ( e.g . UVA , UVB , PUVA ) within 4 week start RunIn . Oral calcineurin inhibitor immunosuppressant ( e.g . cyclosporine , azathioprine , methotrexate ) within 4 week start RunIn . Systemic corticosteroid within 4 week start RunIn . Oral antihistamine leukotriene inhibitor tricyclic antidepressant within 1 week start RunIn . Topical steroid ( potency ) , topical calcineurin inhibitor ( tacrolimus , pimecrolimus ) , salicylic acid urea contain treatment coaltar preparation , topical oral retinoids vitamin D derivative , within 1 week start RunIn .
